flowRoot.flowPara: Username login screen is shown when:
1. Enter username is selected from the main user selection screen
2. The machine is configured to always show the username screen instead of the username grid (aka "anonymous mode")
In the second case, the back button wouldn't be displayed.

This screen is designed to be appropriate for cases where the user account is stored remotely and hasn't been used on the local device (in this case, there won't be a home directory with a local copy of the avatar and wallpaper).
Feedback if an invalid username is entered:
